text:
(a)     "Chief of Police" shall mean the Chief of the Police Department or his or her designee.
     (b)     "OCC" shall mean the Office of Citizen Complaints.
     (c)     "Sustained complaint" shall mean a determination by the Office of Citizen Complaints that a preponderance of the evidence proves that the misconduct or failure to perform a duty complained of did occur. 
(Added by Ord. 244-03, File No. 031401, App. 10/17/2003)

chapter.text: COORDINATION BETWEEN THE POLICE DEPARTMENT AND THE OFFICE OF CITIZEN COMPLAINTS
